Title: Relates to orders of protection and child support enforcement
Summary: Requires an order of protection that has been issued to a victim of domestic violence to include a provision that the order shall not expire or be vacated unless the party against whom such order is issued is in compliance with any court order directing him or her to pay child support and requires an automatic income deduction order for such order of support.
LawCode: Amd §530.11, CP L; amd §§812 & 454, Fam Ct Act; amd §240, Dom Rel L; amd §§5241 & 5242, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, the family court act, the domestic relations law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to orders of protection and child support enforcement
